name: Q*bert 3
genres: Action > Diagonal-down > Fixed / flip-screen > Isometric > Arcade > Platform > Puzzle elements
desc: This game is based on the coin-op of the early 80's. You play an orange ball with two legs and a snout. Q*bert is very good at hopping and does so on an isometric grid in the shape of a pyramid.Q*Bert 3 takes this simple premise and applies it to varying themes and grid layouts. There are a total of 20 levels with 4 boards per level of increasing difficulty. Happy hopping!
